trends: There have been no other sightings in Glade Spring
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAwakened by a light in bedroom window at 3 :14 am. Looked up into sky and sawa grey object with rectangle top and round bottom hovering in sky. Green light illuminated the object and a red light circled the bottom. I turned from window to wake up husband or grab a camera and the object was go rep from sight.
Summary: Rectangle grey top with round bottom illuminated with green lights and a red light circling the bottom.
